snippet: The deadline to register to cast a ballot in the Sept. 10 election is later this week.
abstract: Trailside blog; campaign strategists are focusing on increasingly urgent question of who will show up at polls with New York City mayoral primary less than one month away.
lead_paragraph: The deadline to register to cast a ballot in the Sept. 10 election is later this week.

headline.main: Predicting Who Will Vote in Mayoral Primary
headline.print_headline:
Trying to Predict
Who Will Vote
